text: Ian James Brooks (21 April 1928 â€“ 20 April 2022) was a New Zealand politician of the Labour Party. He was born in Blenheim, New Zealand. Brooks was a member of the New Zealand House of Representatives from 1970 until 1975. Brooks died on 20 April 2022 at a hospital in Blenheim, one day before his 94th birthday. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:New Zealand politicians Category:Marlborough District
title: Ian Brooks
